copy.headline: Submitting information requests to Luno
copy.subheadline: A guide for law enforcement authorities

microcopy.text: Please note: the legal@luno.com email address is only meant for law enforcement and regulator information requests. Customers seeking to close their Luno accounts or who have any account-related queries, should please contact our Customer Success Team at support@luno.com.
microcopy.purpose: Clarifies scope and redirects non-LEA inquiries

dataFormatting: File formats: .xls format, word document format
trustSignals: Luno has experience assisting law enforcement authorities around the world
Requests must be valid written requests from official government domain

flow.userIntent: Understand Luno's privacy practices and learn how to exercise data subject rights or close an account

interactiveElements.action: Navigate to or open contact method for account closure

interactiveElements.element: See Need help updating your personal details hyperlink

flow.informationArchitecture: Overview → transparency commitment with policy reference → data storage/security reassurance → account management info → key user rights (erasure, data modification, account closure) with procedural guidance
frictionPoints: Account closure requires separate contact method (not via form below), creating multi-step process
Multiple hyperlinks scattered throughout may dilute focus

copy.headline: Privacy & Data Protection

microcopy.text: Note: If you wish to close your account, please submit your request to our Customer Success Team here and not via the form below.
microcopy.purpose: Critical procedural clarification to prevent user error

trustSignals: Transparent data collection and usage practices
Cloud services meeting strict infrastructure security requirements
Automated handling of erasure requests (deletes only unnecessary data)
